name: Fastlane Car Racing - Street Drag GT Free
name_original: Fastlane Car Racing - Street Drag GT Free
description:
✭✭✭✭✭ Fast Speed Car Racing! ✭✭✭✭✭

Buckle up... You've cracked the safe, robbed the bank and the cops are after you! Steal your getaway car, collect your cash and get out of dodge.

Just don't get caught by the cops, are you game?

Features Include:

• Fast and frantic racer
• 4 vehicles to drive, all with different handling
• Drive and fire the TANK
• Game Center leaderboard
• Collect the stolen cash

Watch out for the oil slicks and traffic cones!

So easy to control, to drive simply touch the screen and move your finger, better cars have tighter controls. How far and how fast can you go?

So pedal to the metal and download A Fastlane Car Racing NOW while it's 100% FREE!
